Package graph

Reactive computation graph: Topic – holds a value (as Message) and notifies subscribed agents.

    Topic
    A node in the reactive graph that holds a value and notifies subscribed agents when a new Message is published.
    TopicManagerSingleton
    Thread-safe global registry of topics.
    TopicManagerSingleton.TopicManager
    Actual implementation holder; exposed methods delegate here.

Package graph Description

Reactive computation graph:
  • Topic – holds a value (as Message) and notifies subscribed agents.
  • Agent – receives messages and produces new ones, pushing the computation forward.
  • TopicManagerSingleton – global registry + helper methods.
An agent may subscribe to one or more topics and publish to another, forming a directed graph. See ParallelAgent for an example of wrapping an agent with its own thread.
